item.title: Engine Anti-Ice VALVE Lights – Associated Valve Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided associated valve is inoperative.

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard affected light "ENGINE ANTI-ICE VALVE LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
